name: node-path-changer
description: Changes nodejs's NODE_PATH env var programmatically

scripts.prepublish: npm install --global del-cli && del-cli *.js *.d.ts *.map test/*.js test/*.d.ts test/*.map &&  tsc && mocha
scripts.test: npm install --global del-cli && del-cli *.js *.d.ts *.map test/*.js test/*.d.ts test/*.map &&  tsc && mocha

author: Pedro Moreira
